name: CITY OF CRANSTON v. LOCAL 1363, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS, AFL-CIO
name_abbreviation: City of Cranston v. Local 1363, International Association of Firefighters

parties: CITY OF CRANSTON v. LOCAL 1363, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS, AFL-CIO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Jeremiah S. Jeremiah, Jr., City Sol., Cranston, Vincent J. Piccirilli, Providence, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
CITY OF CRANSTON v. LOCAL 1363, INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS, AFL-CIO.
No. 80-480-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 26, 1980.
Jeremiah S. Jeremiah, Jr., City Sol., Cranston, Vincent J. Piccirilli, Providence, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Providence, for respondent.
